page.title: 01NW NEWBURY & SPEEN
page.content: {URBAN AREA}:Comprises southern part of area;contains 2 major post-war housing estates,one in{Speen,}the other in {Shaw}separated by A34 N/S trunk rd.Each estate contains public sector & private housing.Area generally well maintained with evident pride in property.Little industry,except for some small service firms,conference centre,pubs etc. {RURAL AREA}Extends to N.limit of area.Few small communities:{ {DONNINGTON,BAGNOR}being largest.Area mostly agricultural with both arable & pasture land. {TOURIST ATTRACTIONS:Donnington Castle} &{Watermill Theatre,Bagnor. {NAME DERIVATION: SPEEN},said to come from Latin:-{SPINAE},"a thorny place" & from Britons' {SPIAN}.
